analysis.key_quote: If federal employees can be fired for their political views( which have nothing to do with their jobs) then I believe this will lead to inefficiency in the work place, because the employee will know they can be fired on a whim for nothing.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the potential for employees to be fired based on political views, which indicates opposition to the proposed rule. It highlights issues of workplace efficiency and morale, linking them to the politicization of employment decisions.
